notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: SB performed the animal necropsies and routine diagnostics. BH designed the molecular assays. KS and SB performed the molecular assays. MJ and DH executed metagenomics analyses. KS did the phylogenetic analyses. KS wrote the draft. KS, SB and BH worked on the manuscript. SB, KS, MB and BH designed the study. All the authors read and approved the final manuscript.
